title: LVMH CEO: ‘Vuitton’s Not Going to Go Into the Hotel Business’
summary: LVMH CEO Bernard Arnault said there won't be a Louis Vuitton Hotels brand, despite online speculation to the contrary. He said he wanted to keep the retail brand 'focused, not diversified.'
